OCD.description: STS Ldap and Roles Claims Handler Configuration. WARNING: The server must be restarted for these updates to take affect.
OCD.name: Security STS LDAP and Roles Claims Handler

AD.name: LDAP URL:
AD.description: LDAP or LDAPS server and port

AD.name: LDAP Bind User DN:
AD.description: DN of the user to bind with LDAP. This user should have the ability to verify passwords and read attributes for any user.

AD.name: LDAP Bind User Password:
AD.description: Password used to bind user with LDAP.

AD.name: LDAP Username Attribute:
AD.description: Attribute used to designate the user's name in LDAP. Usually this is uid, cn, or something similar.

AD.name: LDAP Base User DN:
AD.description: Full LDAP path to where users can be found.

AD.name: LDAP Group ObjectClass:
AD.description: ObjectClass that defines structure for group membership in LDAP. Usually this is groupOfNames or groupOfUniqueNames.

AD.name: LDAP Membership Attribute:
AD.description: Attribute used to designate the user's name as a member of the group in LDAP. Usually this is member or uniqueMember.

AD.name: LDAP Base Group DN:
AD.description: Full LDAP path to where groups can be found.

AD.name: Attribute Map File:
AD.description: Location of the file which contains user attribute maps to use.
